mods.abstract: Prince Rahotep and Princess Nofret (Old Kingdom Dynasty II) at the Boulaq Museum; seated statues of Princes Rahotep and his wife Princess Nofret found in his mastaba tomb at Meidum; husband and wife stare passively ahead, wear simple white garments, wife wears collar necklace and cropped wig; Rahotep's titles inscribed on the back of his throne, feet resting on stone pedestals; untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
